boardgame.name: Contatos Cósmicos

Rencontre cosmique
Universumin valtiaat
Universums härskare
boardgame.description: By request of Fantasy Flight Games, Board Game Geek lists the various editions of Cosmic Encounter in separate entries. Each edition is the same game at its core, but the features, compatible expansions, and production differ among them. This entry is for the original 1977 Eon version._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players represent alien races that are seeking to spread themselves onto five foreign worlds. To accomplish this, they make challenges against other players and enlist the aid of interested parties. But alien powers, which are unique to each race, give players ways to bend or outright break some rule in the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game continues until one player occupies five planets in other systems to win. Shared victories are possible and a player need not occupy one's own system to win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Cosmic Encounter: White Dwarf Magazine Expansion

Avalon Hill version. Complete with addition of a two-minute sand timer.

COSMIC ENCOUNTER 1991 Mayfair Games. Includes all 48 Alien Power cards, 72 Challenge cards, 22 Edict cards, 48 Flare cards, 26 Destiny cards, 6 Planet Hex boards _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; 1 Warp board, 6 token sets (20 each color red, blue, yellow, purple, light blue, orange), 1 Hyper-Space Cone, 6 Planetary Power cards. Complete with everything except the rulebook, so I am including printouts of : Mayfair Basic Rules, Mayfair Hex Rules, Eon Hex Rules, Internet Hex Rules, and the Eon _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Complete Book of Cosmic Encounter_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; Rules. All components were hand checked for completeness and quality as follows... the tokens for light blue have 5 punched out, the rest of the tokens in all sets are unpunched. It looks as if someone pulled the game out to play, started to setup and then put it all back away. The rest of the game is in perfect condition except for 5 cards (1 destiny, 1 challenge, 3 flares) which have finger creases from being mishandled, unfortunately. Considering the value of such a game, I have to be VERY picky about its condition. If you wish to see pictures of the 5 cards please go to my website at this location - http://www.drakezeus.com/cosmicencounter.htm - Shipping weight is 5 pounds.

This is the 1977 Eon edition with the large red planet on the cover of the box. The box is in good condition with one corner split and some shelf wear). Contents are in excellent condition (punched). This is just the original set, no additional expansions (15 original aliens). This one was maybe played a couple times... if that...
Avalon Hill version. Played only a few times.
This is the Hasbro/AH version, and has been played only once. It is in wonderful condition.
This is the original 1977 Eon addition and is 100% complete The box is worn but sound and in reasonable reasonable shape, the contents are in good condition.
Complete Games Workshop edition. In excellent condition inside and out. Cheques and Postal Orders accepted from UK buyers only - Buyer pays full shipping costs.
Eon version, complete. Box is in very poor condition. All game components are in fair to good condition.
Hasbro/Avalon Hill Edition. Played twice. Great shape!
Opened but unplayed Hasbro edition. I really just need to make room, hence my selling it. Excellent shape!

Mayfair editions of Cosmic Encounter, More Cosmic Encounter and Simply Cosmic. All fit in Cosmic Encounter box (no other boxes included). Components have never been played with but are unwrapped. This collection has home bases for 10 players. It includes I believe the count is 110 aliens to choose from. Box is in very good to excellent condition - it has some wear on the box edges but is quite functional. Great collection of this favorite of the Mayfair edition sets.
New Avalon Hill edition. Brand new in box. All card unopened and board is unpunched. Plastic parts still in wrapping. Will also trade. Email me trade requests.
1999 Hasbro / Avalon Hill edition. New in shrink. Box has minor shelf wear on some of the corners.
Box has mini wear, but game is unplayed and some parts still in shrink. Shipping is 9.00$ within U.S., insurance 1.30$ opotional

Mayfair Cosmic Extreme, includes Simply Cosmic, More Cosmic and hexes and blank cards to bring set up to six player capacity. Shrink wrap has been removed and rules read, but nothing has been punched or played and so the sets are virtually new. I will ship free to anywhere in the domestic US.

New, unused, and in shrinkwrap. While the game is new, the box is worked and the shrinkwrap is torn and shredded, although still on. The contents should still be in pristine condition, though. played only once +++++ this is the latest avalon hill edition with very nice components +++++ you can download rules translations from boardgame geek ++++++++++ will be shipped insured +++++ international payment : paypal OR direct bank to bank transfer (wich is cost-free inside european union by the way) OR cash (in a registered letter, exchanged into euros already) +++++ payment for germany : paypal OR personal pick up in berlin OR direct bank to bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! ++++++++++ international buyers beware : though german postal is relatively fast, they sadly aren´t cheap. it costs bewteen 19 - 37 euros for parcels up to a weight of 5 kg (= about 4 big boxed boardgames). price depends on where the package has to be shipped, so please ask for prices, before you hit the buy button ! +++++ insured shipment inside germany costs 8 euros

Expansion 2 one gold token missing gold tokens are worn, look silver round the edges. Expansion 3 ok The powers have been folded (not something I would do), but powers and cards and boards are in good condition. This is the AH version.

This is a clean, player’s copy of Eon Cosmic Encounter plus all expansions. Due to the nature of the game (perforated cards, lucre chits, punch out moons, etc.) there are various ‘hanging chads’ but nothing that detracts from either playability or appearance UNLESS SPECIFICALLY NOTED. Overall, I’d grade this as VG+ to Fine or “lightly but lovingly played’ The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Acceptable_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; in the main listing refers to the box damage and the odd missing rules sheet (full rules from Expansion 9 are included). Please GM if you have specific questions or concerns. Cosmic Encounter Component List from: http://daveola.com/CosmicEncounter/Components/Eon.html Eon Edition Basic Set 15 Alien powers Amoeba, Chronos, Clone, Empath, Laser, Macron, Mind, Mutant, Oracle, Philanthropist, Trader, Virus, Void, Vulch, Zombie Chronos, Clone, Empath, Macron, Mind, Mutant, Oracle, Virus, Zombie alien cards have brown stains on back-random and does NOT affect front of powers or play (e.g. can’t memorize card from back stains) 54 Cards: (all cards in great condition, including flares and cards from other expansions) Attack 30(1), 20(2), 18(1), 15(2), 14(2), 12(4), 10(6), 8(8), 6(8), 4(2). Compromise(10). Edict Cosmic Zap(2), Emotion Control(1), Force Field(1), Mobius Tubes(2), Plague(1), Stellar Gas(1) 4 Planet Hexes: (all hexes in set have very minor warping-noticeable, but NOT affecting game play or stability of discs/tokens on hexes during play) 4 Token sets (4 discs and 20 tokens per set-all tokens in set complete and in great condition unless noted)[/i] Red, Blue, Green, Yellow 1 Warp Hex 1 Hyper-Space Cone (very good condition) 1 Rules book (slight creases/folds along lower right edge/bottom) Expansion Set 1 10 Alien powers Crystal, Dictator, Grudge, Magnet, Parasite, Plant, Seeker, Skeptic, Will, Worm 1 Planet Hex 1 Token set Silver (later this was changed to Orange) (both colors present and complete) Expansion Set 2 10 Alien powers Anti-matter, Calculator, Diplomat, Filch, Gambler, Insect, Judge, Machine, Miser, Sorcerer 1 Planet Hex 1 Token set Gold(later this was changed to Purple) Purple complete and great condition, Gold has 3 replacements:see photo in my gallery or search for [imageid=408009] Expansion Set 3 15 Alien powers Assassin, Assessor, Aura, Changeling, Demon, Deuce, Doppleganger, Healer, Mesmer, Reincarnator, Schizoid, Silencer, Vacuum, Warrior, Wrack 9 cards Attack 17(1), 13(1), 9(2), 7(1). Compromise(1). Edict Rebirth(1), Timegash(1), Victory Boon(1) Expansion Set 4 50 Flares for all of the above aliens 1 rule sheet for flares and Zilch and Shark (7th and 8th player alien powers) NOT PRESENT-rules can be found in complete rulebook for expansion #9 Expansion Set 5 100 Moons 1 rule sheet for moons Bonus: Header signed by Peter Olotka: see photo in my gallery or search for [imageid=408010] Expansion Set 6 10 Alien powers Butler, Dragon, Ethic, Extortionist, Force, Hurtz, Lloyd, Negator, Pirate, Visionary 1 Lucre set (96 counters present, do not know how many were in a full set) 1 rule sheet for lucre Expansion Set 7 14 Alien powers Boomerang, Bully, Delegator, Disease, Filth, Fungus, Loser, Pacifist, Prophet, Siren, Sniveler, Terrorist, Warpish, Witch Expansion Set 8 25 Flares for aliens from sets 6,7, and 9 26 cards Attack 40(1), 16(1), 15(2), 12(1), 7(3), 5(2), 1(1). Compromise(4). Edict Finder(1), Flare Zap(1), Keeper(1), Sanity(1), Un-Zap(1), Warp Break(1). Kicker 3(1), 2(3), 0(1) 1 rule sheet for kickers NOT PRESENT: Rules found in complete rules from Expansion 9 Expansion Set 9 1 Alien power Aristocrat 6 Unique planet hex stickers Gas Giant, Pulsar, Rings, Six Pact, Space Dust, Spiral Gas Giant, Rings, Six Pact, Spiral-Eon expansion #9 hex backed w/ 1986 West End Hex (no difference than Eon other than copyright line). Space Dust is backed w/ 1983 Eon hex, Pulsar is backed w/ 1977 Eon Hex. Warp/Praw is also backed by 1986 West End hex Full rules available 6 Reverse Hyper-Space cone stickers (for destiny pile) NOT PRESENT 1 Reverse Hyper-Space cone sticker (for Hyper-Space cone) Affixed to regular hyperspace cone (there is also a regular cone w/o backing) 1 complete rule book-creases/folds along lower right corner includes all of the above rules and unique planet and reverse cone rules EDIT: What about the box? It is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;waving alien_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; cover: [imageid=110749] To be charitable, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s taken many shots to the body for the team. A couple of splits, a crease, some dishing and side scuffs. The front art is other than the dishing, pretty clean. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s included, but hey, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re not buying this for the box are you :D Buy pays shipping, tracking, insurance. I ship USPS Flat Rate Priority. Approximate costs as of 12/08 (and verified for actuall S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H upon sale): US: $12 Canada/Mexico: $25 International: $40 Non-paypal or non-secure funds will need to clear before shipping. Non-US Buyers: I will either purchase _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;proof of mailing_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; or at seller_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s expense send via Registered mail or by provider of seller_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s choice/expense. Buyers are responsible for ALL Taxes, duties, tariffs, surcharges, etc. and once I mail the package, I can not assume any responsibility for time/condition or actual delivery.
